name: Daraz.pk
tag_list: online-shopping-in-pakistan, daraz-pk, daraz, daraz-pakistan, online-shopping, fashion-shop, online-fashion-shop, cheap-clothes, branded-apparel, branded-clothing
overview:
Daraz.pk is the largest online shopping platform for fashion fanatics in Pakistan. We are reshaping the face of e-commerce by supporting our credo of convenience, while redefining the term shopping and presenting it to the general population. Furthermore, the website is specifically designed to be user-friendly and we have the most responsive customer support team to handle orders and queries efficiently.

The question arises: Why Daraz?

Each individual at Daraz strives 24/7 to put forward an irresistible collection of the best designer ensembles, fashion footwear, bags & accessories with the convenience of free shipping - on purchase of Rs 1,500 worth of merchandise - along with free 7-day returns and cash on delivery services. Unanimously our cutting edge e-commerce platform, savvy customer support, innovative warehouse systems and ingeniously experienced buying team help make your shopping experience worthwhile. The foremost motive is to provide the exact product you love; at your doorstep regardless of time, place or geographical location, while understanding the precise needs of each customer. Daraz brings out your personalized trend and style, keeping your budget in mind.

With just a few clicks the product you liked will be delivered at your doorstep through our trusted courier partners that let you pay cash on delivery.The website offers an extensive array of fashion/branded clothing lines even greater than the fashion hubs of the country like Zamzama, M.M.Alam Road and Jinnah Super combined, along with footwear, jewellery and cultural apparel of some of the renowned brand names of Pakistan under one roof.

Daraz.pk has been given the accolades of being the simplest, and the most convenient website for having user-friendly interface by its existing customers. Since the launch of the business earlier this year, it has successfully gathered a huge number of customers by serving them in the best manner, and creating a separate identity of its own in the online industry. It is an online platform that has the objectives to shift the perception and divert the local populace towards the online shopping trend which is booming across the globe.

Visit our website; call us on (021) 11-11-32729 or email us at customer@daraz.pk for any queries or concerns.

For business development & partnership: suppliers@daraz.pk

offices.address1: 6th floor, 6-A, Dolmen Executive Tower, Dha, Karachi, Pakistan
